title: [Neuroscience] The brains of patients who died as a result of COVID-19 infection displayed some of the same molecular changes found in the brains of those with Alzheimer’s disease, a new small study found. The findings may explain why some long-term COVID sufferers report memory problems.

[Medicine] Carnosic acid, a compound found in the herb rosemary, may represent an effective countermeasure against both acute and chronic pathological events initiated by SARS-CoV-2 infection as well as other chronic neurodegenerative diseases including Alzheimer’s disease & Parkinson’s disease
